Articles.Content: I've read all of universe replacers documentation, and I know how to replace the textures. I just can't seem to find the location for the textures anywhere. Can someone point me in the right directory please
Wait, are you trying to put new textures in, or retrieve the stock textures?

If your trying to replace stock textures the folder is in the mod directory, so gamedata, universe replacer, and you have a list of planets, moons, and the skybox. You just put the textures you downloaded in those. If your looking for stock textures, then I don't know where they are. Hope this helps
I'm fairly sure that the stock textures are packed into the .assets files by unity, and you probably need the unity dev tools to unpack them.
